General.Description: Cardano is a public blockchain and cryptocurrency project that is decentralized as well as is a totally open source. Cardano is developing a smart contracting platform that provides more advanced features than any of the previously developed protocols. This is the first blockchain platform developed out of a scientific philosophy and the first research method. The development team consists of a global set of engineers and expert researchers.
General.Features: The Cardano project could be a next-generation blockchain, creating a new localized economy, and financial democratization in developing markets. It refers to the need for close monitoring while maintaining the privacy and protection of customers through innovative design. This flexible and scalable stack software system is developed with the most stringent standards for educational and industrial software systems. Cardano describes a model of democratic governance that will allow the project to evolve and a visionary treasury system to fund it sustainably.
General.Technology: Bitcoin's Proof of Work has been replaced by a largely unmanaged Proof of Stake (PoS) rule designed specifically for Cardano. ADA users have privacy protection similar to Bitcoin when dealing on a CSL with greater speed and transactional capabilities as a result of its PoS rules.
General.Sponsor: This coin is sponsored by SYMM. This is an ERC20-compliant smart contract and is an investment fund trades and invests in ICOs and cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Dash, and Litecoin.
